overview.en: Mycion (MYC) is committed to the development of the underlying technology of Block Chain 5.0, providing a complete set of solutions for the safe and convenient chain-up of off-chain assets. It is a decentralized, tamper-proof and traceable block chain affirmative ecological application system. It covers private social networking, decentralized wallet, traceable chain business system, decentralized exchange system. The goal is to establish a new ecology for integrated application of distributed borderless block chains. Construct fair, safe, free and trustworthy block chain applications. Mycion (tender bud chain) native Token, referred to as MYC. Token, as the circulation Token of Mycion's application layer, can also be used as a community incentive and transaction fee.
overview.zh: Mycion（MYC）致力于区块链5.0底层技术开发，为链外资产安全便捷上链提供全套解决方案。是去中心化、防篡改、可追溯的区块链确权生态应用系统。涵盖私密社交，去中心化钱包，溯源链商系统，去中心化交易所系统。目标是建立分布式无国界的区块链综合应用新生态。构建公平、安全、自由、可信任区块链应用。Mycion（嫩芽链）的原生Token，简称MYC。Token作为 Mycion的应用层进行资产交易的流通Token，也可以作为社区激励，交易手续费。
